heartite_bastard_recipe.description: A two-handed sword made with Heartite Alloy.

heartite_bow_recipe.description: A firm and flexible bow made with Heartite Alloy.

heartite_shield_recipe.description: A large shield made with Heartite Alloy.
heartite_shield_recipe.flavor: Strength comes from an indomitable will.

scholar_encyclopedia_recipe.description: An Encyclopedia for promoting A Scholar.
scholar_encyclopedia_recipe.flavor: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

da_vinci_tonic_recipe.description: A tonic that buffs curiosity and inventiveness.

pla_tonic_recipe.description: A tonic that buffs willpower and compassion.

rune_clay_turret_recipe.description: A turret that slows down the enemies.

heartite_ballista_recipe.description: A heavy ballista with giant arrows.
heartite_ballista_recipe.flavor: Slow, but strong as the heartite.

concrete_fence_gate_recipe.description: A fence gate made with concrete materials.
concrete_fence_gate_recipe.flavor: Well... it's more of a wall, right?

concrete_fence_recipe.description: A fence made with concrete materials.
concrete_fence_recipe.flavor: Well... it's more of a wall, right?

obsidian_maul_recipe.description: A simple maul made with a hunk of obsidian.
obsidian_maul_recipe.flavor: Yes, it burns when inside the lava.

obsidian_skull_recipe.flavor: It's not really a skull. I think...

carbonearth_mail_recipe.description: An mail armor made with Carbon Fabric and Heartite Alloy.
carbonearth_mail_recipe.flavor: It's light, but doesn't make you faster.

carbonearth_plate_recipe.description: An plate armor made with Carbon Fabric and Heartite Alloy.
carbonearth_plate_recipe.flavor: It's light, and makes you faster.

rune_clay_recipe.flavor: Actually it's the carving part that's hard.
